          <title>
            <string language="en">Kinds of rocks</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Arten der Felsen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Genres de roches</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tipos das rochas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Generi di roccie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Είδη βράχων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Clases de rocas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the different kinds of rocks namely, igneous, sedimentary and metamorphic rocks. It also shows examples of each rock type.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">granite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">igneous</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metamorphic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">quartzite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sedimentary</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die unterschiedlichen Arten
der Felsen nämlich, Eruptiv-, sedimentäre und metamorphe Felsen. 
Sie zeigt auch Beispiele jedes Felsentypen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les différents genres 
de roches notamment, ignées, sédimentaires et métamorphiques les 
roches. Elle montre également des exemples de chaque type de 
roche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os tipos diferentes das 
rochas a saber, rochas igneous, sedimentary e metamorphic. 
Mostra também exemplos de cada tipo da rocha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra i generi differenti 
di roccie cioè, roccie ignee, sedimentarie e metamorfiche. 
Egualmente mostra gli esempi di ogni tipo della roccia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει διαφορετικά είδη βράχων 
συγκεκριμένα, πύρινοι, ιζηματώδεις και μεταμορφικοί βράχοι. 
Εμφανίζει επίσης παραδείγματα κάθε τύπου βράχου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las diversas clases de 
rocas las es decir, ígneas, sedimentarias y metamórficas rocas. 
También muestra ejemplos de cada tipo de la roca.</string>
          </description>
